titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 9/16/1987--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act with respect to specified (ideological) grounds for exclusion and deportation of aliens. Amends Federal law to repeal the provision requiring the Secretary of State to admit an alien excluded from nonimmigrant entry because of proscribed organization affiliation, but otherwise admissible, unless such person is a security risk.
